HTMLInputElementType.summary: The type property of the interface indicates the kind of data allowed in the {{HTMLElement("input")}} element, or example a number, a date, or an email. Browsers will select the appropriate widget and behavior to help users to enter a valid value.

remarks.para: It reflects the type attribute of the input element.

HTMLInputElementType.value: A string representing the type.Its possible values are listed in the attribute's input types section.
